thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, opposite Rockefeller Center - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A great adult family getaway
thread.title_full: A great adult family getaway - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, opposite Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Carol K
title: A great adult family getaway
text: We went to NYC to see our granddaughter perform at Carnegie Hall and chose to stay at Club Quarters along with our son and daughter in law. The hotel and service were impeccable. We especially enjoyed the friendly people and atmosphere in the 7th floor lounge. And the rooms were just what we needed.
